text: The Senate () is the upper house of the Polish parliament, the lower house being the 'Sejm'. The Senate is based in Warsaw. The Senate is made up of 100 senators elected by universal ballot and is headed by the Marshal of the Senate (MarszaÅ‚ek Senatu). The incumbent Marshal of the Senate is Tomasz Grodzki. ==Other websites== * Category:National upper houses Category:Government of Poland
title: Senate of Poland
